help-file.title: "HYMN OF MORBID VISIONS"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Room Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of singer Type of song: Divination
"Hymn of Morbid Visions" allows those in the room to better detect auras around them. As the piper increases in skill, so does the song, allowing those in the room to detect invisibility, the presence of life, and farsight.
